item.title: 美国给雪佛龙一个月时间结束在委内瑞拉的运营
item.description: 美国财政部兑现了唐纳德-特朗普总统的承诺，阻止雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）抽取和销售委内瑞拉原油，对尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）的专制政权造成了重大打击。【原文：The U.S. Treasury followed through on President Donald Trump’s pledge to stop Chevron Corp. from pumping and selling Venezuelan crude, delivering a major blow to Nicolas Maduro’s autocratic regime.】

item.title: 航空业要求迅速升级 FAA 关键系统
item.description: 在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）力推太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的 "星链"（Starlink）作为现代化解决方案之际，航空业团体和工会领导人呼吁联邦航空管理局加快升级关键的空中交通管制系统。【原文：Aviation industry groups and union leaders called on the Federal Aviation Administration to expedite upgrades to critical air-traffic control systems, as Elon Musk pushes SpaceX’s Starlink as a solution for modernization.】

item.title: 让我们谈谈特朗普悖论
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税为何会推高美国汽油价格？
item.description: 美国人喜欢开车，也喜欢廉价驾驶，但新近对从加拿大和墨西哥进口的石油征收的关税可能会提高美国各地的汽油价格，并让负责生产燃料的炼油厂头疼不已。【原文：Americans love driving and doing so on the cheap, but newly imposed tariffs on oil imported from Canada and Mexico are likely to raise gasoline prices around the US and cause headaches for the refiners responsible for making the fuel.】

item.title: 美国股市因关税打击而抹去特朗普 3.4 万亿美元涨势
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫是华尔街庆祝的理由。仅在大选日后的一个月内，S&P 500 指数就跃升了 5%以上，价值增加了约 2.8 万亿美元，因为人们预期新政府将为经济注入活力。【原文：Donald Trump’s return to the White House was cause for celebration on Wall Street. In the month after Election Day alone, the S&P 500 Index jumped more than 5%, adding some $2.8 trillion in value, on the expectation that the new administration would juice the economy.】

item.title: 英国银行从英国央行融资机制借款 100 亿英镑，为科威德事件以来最多
item.description: 由于英国央行试图从金融系统中抽走额外的流动性，导致对现金的需求增加，英国银行从英格兰银行的一个重要机构借入了自大流行病以来最多的资金。【原文：UK banks are borrowing the most since the pandemic from a key Bank of England facility as the central bank’s attempt to remove extra liquidity from the financial system prompts increased demand for cash.】

item.title: 加纳警告能源债务到 2027 年可能翻一番后债券下跌
item.description: 加纳财政部长卡西尔-阿托-福尔松（Cassiel Ato Forson）表示，除非采取行动，否则到 2027 年该国的能源债务可能会翻一番，此后加纳的欧元债券周二下跌，成为新兴市场中表现最差的国家之一。【原文：Ghana’s eurobonds fell on Tuesday and were among the worst performers in emerging markets, after Finance Minister Cassiel Ato Forson suggested that the country’s energy debt could double by 2027 unless action was taken.】

item.title: 铜矿商泰克首席执行官称将在美国以外寻找金属买家
item.description: 泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd. ）首席执行官警告说，美国关税将 "推高 "整个采矿业的 "通胀"，并鼓励公司到其他国家寻找客户。【原文：Teck Resources Ltd.’s chief executive officer warned that US tariffs will “drive inflation up” throughout the mining industry and encourage companies to find customers in other countries.】

item.title: 千禧年以 10 亿美元支持 Janus Henderson 的 Stockpicker
item.description: 千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）支持 Janus Henderson 投资组合经理本-华莱士（Ben Wallace），因为这家跨国对冲基金巨头继续向外部交易员提供资金。【原文：Millennium Management is backing Janus Henderson portfolio manager Ben Wallace, as the multistrategy hedge fund giant continues to fork out capital to external traders.】

item.title: 苹果推出升级版 iPad Air 以维持平板电脑增长
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）推出了配备更快处理器的新款 iPad Air，增强了这款设备的性能，使其在 iPhone 不景气的情况下仍能帮助提升假日销售额。【原文：Apple Inc. rolled out a new iPad Air with a faster processor, enhancing a device that helped lift holiday sales despite an iPhone slump.】

item.title: 德国可通过新规则释放 2,200 亿欧元用于投资
item.description: 德国联邦银行（Bundesbank）称，德国应放宽宪法规定的借贷限制，以便在2030年前释放出高达2200亿欧元（2320亿美元）的财政空间，用于促进基础设施建设和军费开支。【原文：Germany should loosen constitutional borrowing limits to free up as much as €220 billion ($232 billion) of fiscal space through 2030 to boost infrastructure and military spending, according to the Bundesbank.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行麦凯警告美国关税将打击经济增长
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行的戴夫-麦凯（Dave McKay）说，他希望美国的关税最终只是暂时的，但看到唐纳德-特朗普总统挑起的贸易战可能会阻碍更广泛的经济增长，这令人失望。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada’s Dave McKay said he’s hopeful US tariffs end up being temporary but that it’s disappointing to see the trade war started by President Donald Trump potentially impeding broader economic growth.】

item.title: 诺和诺德、赛诺菲面临南非胰岛素反垄断调查
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）和赛诺菲公司（Sanofi）因担心人胰岛素笔市场可能存在反竞争行为而在南非面临调查。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S and Sanofi are facing an investigation in South Africa over concerns about potential anti-competitive practices in the human insulin pen market.】

item.title: 南非企业看到经济加速带来的需求复苏
item.description: 南非各公司公布的财报显示，消费者需求正在恢复，这得益于令人沮丧的电力短缺现象的结束和通货膨胀的放缓。【原文：South African companies reported earnings that showed consumer demand was recovering, helped by the end of debilitating power shortages and slowing inflation.】

item.title: Nedbank 和 Norfund 收购南非 Pele Energy 股份
item.description: 南非奈德银行集团有限公司（Nedbank Group Ltd.）和挪威投资公司 Norfund AS 正在收购一家可再生能源公司的 "大量少数 "股份，该公司由摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：South Africa’s Nedbank Group Ltd. and Norwegian investment firm Norfund AS are acquiring a “substantial minority” stake in a renewable energy company co-founded by a former JPMorgan Chase & Co. banker.】

item.title: 德意志银行认为美元有失去避险天堂地位的风险
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）称，随着全球市场适应新的地缘政治秩序，美元可能会失去其传统的避险地位。【原文：The US dollar may lose its traditional safe-haven status as global markets adjust to a new geopolitical order, according to Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.title: 贝森特回避关税大跌，称华尔街并非关注焦点
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统征收外国关税的扩张性计划充满信心，尽管股市因加拿大和墨西哥的首轮征税而下滑。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent projected confidence in President Donald Trump’s expansive plans to tariff foreign nations even as the stock market slumped in reaction to the first round of levies on Canada and Mexico.】

item.description: 就在华尔街波动肆虐之际，一家鲜为人知的 ETF 公司最新利用了日间交易者对杠杆股票押注的无情需求。【原文：A little-known ETF firm is the latest to tap into relentless day-trader demand for leveraged stock bets, just as volatility lashes Wall Street.】

item.title: 年轻购物者涌向 Miu Miu，Prada 无惧奢侈品市场放缓

item.title: 大众的人类股权是 ETF 行业的最新赌注
item.description: 它结合了华尔街最热门的两个趋势：对所有人工智能事物的狂热，以及向大众提供私人资产的竞赛。【原文：It’s a combination of two of the hottest trends on Wall Street: the frenzy for all things artificial intelligence, and the race to offer private assets to the masses.】

item.title: 欧元创 2025 年新高，银行放弃平价赎回以推动国防建设
item.description: 欧元兑美元汇率升至今年以来的最强水平，原因是流向欧洲国防工业的现金墙促使分析师放弃了对两种货币平价的预测。【原文：The euro rose to its strongest this year versus the dollar as the wall of cash headed for Europe’s defense industry prompts analysts to drop forecasts for parity between the two currencies.】

item.title: 阿联酋阿德诺克公司（Adnoc）在与 OMV 达成巨额交易后瞄准更多化工业务增长点
item.description: 这家由 Adnoc 和 OMV AG 的化工部门合并而成的公司市值 600 亿美元，其目标是将利润提高 50%以上，并对进一步交易或建设新工厂持开放态度。【原文：The $60 billion company formed by the merger of Adnoc and OMV AG’s chemical units is targeting a more than 50% boost in profits, and remains open for further deals or building new plants.】
